question: 三杯
sourceMnemonic: <kanji>Three</kanji> <kanji>cups of liquid</kanji> is <vocabulary>three cups of liquid</vocabulary>, or more simply, <vocabulary>three cups</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well. Just watch out for <ja>杯</ja>, which becomes <ja>ばい</ja> thanks to our old friend rendaku.
